https://tmrev.io/movie/525654-Barry Barclay: The Camera on the Shore 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tF0Cb3IqWQQ1N0VJqU0S573GMP4.jpg Barry Barclay was a New Zealand/Aotearoa director of documentaries and feature films. He is regarded as one of the world's first, and very influential, Indigenous film makers. The film The Camera on The Shore is a feature length introduction to Barry, and to his film making. Barry Barclay: The Camera on the Shore
